fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Kawa is a talented river guider able to control the tide to their liking. At night they may choose two players to be attracted to their river. If the players are of opposite factions they will both be dealt a basic attack by being pulled into the water. Can only be done 3 times and cannot target their own Fox team members. This ability will take the place of the factional kill

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this rolls replace any fox head with Umi.
- If no Fox Heads are rolled roll Umi.
